suncertify

Interface View

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ViewImpl

    public interface View
    This interface defines methods in a view object. A view object will represent the interface between the application and the user.
    Version:
    Dec 11, 2012
    Author:
    Moses L. Jilugu

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUserGestureListener(Controller controller)
      Method to register a controller for the view.
      void handleRecordsChange()
      Method to notify the view of changes in records in the data model.
      void showDisplay(java.lang.Object object)
      Method called to display a given object on the view.

    • Method Detail

      • addUserGestureListener

        void addUserGestureListener(Controller controller)
        Method to register a controller for the view. The controller provides methods to handle events risen by users.
        Parameters:
        controller - controller object

      • handleRecordsChange

        void handleRecordsChange()
        Method to notify the view of changes in records in the data model. This will cause the view to refresh its display by re-fetching current displayed records from database.

      • showDisplay

        void showDisplay(java.lang.Object object)
        Method called to display a given object on the view. Appropriate action will be taken depending on the type of object.
        Parameters:
        object - object to be displayed.
